attributes.action: MAKE IT THE LAW TO STOP FOR CATS IF HIT BY A VEHICLE
attributes.additional_details: Recently my four month old kitten was killed by a driver who did not stop and carried on speeding down the road. Unfortunately I was there and had to witness her death and carried her as she died in my arms. This has now traumatized me and I can never forget what happened to my Lucy. I had to bury her yesterday and now I need for there to be a law put in place to stop this from happening to other people's cats as it's literally the worst thing.
attributes.background: Need for there to be a law put in place to make drivers stop after they've hit a cat.
